mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, menu_url, parent_id, menu_order, menu_icon, menu_type, menu_hidden from sys_user a, sys_role_user_table b, sys_role_frontend_menu_table c, sys_menu d where a.user_id = b.user_id and b.role_id = c.role_id and c.frontend_menu_id = d.menu_id and a.username = #{username}
